Package com.mk4droid.IMC_Activities

Activities of the application.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Activity_Filters Filtering of issues
Activity_Information_Detailed Details about the application and the authors
Activity_Issue_Details Show issue details.
Activity_List View of issues as a list
Activity_Main This is the activity that shows all issues overlaid on a map.
Activity_NewIssueA First activity for submitting an issue: select category, write a title, write a description, and attach an image.
Activity_NewIssueB Second activity for submitting an issue: selecting the location of the issue and submit to remote server
Activity_Setup This is the activity where settings can be modified.
Activity_SoloMap Show a single issue on the map
Activity_Splash_Register Shown before the start of the actual application to prompt user to register.
Activity_TabHost Tabs (at the bottom of application) are hosted in this activity
Group_ListOfIssues Group containing the sequence of activities for the tab list
Group_NewIssue This is a group of two activities: NewIssueA for textual and image info; and NewIssueB for location information.
 

Package com.mk4droid.IMC_Activities Description

Activities of the application. They are "windows" where information is visualized.
